data.title: Mansiysk climate: Weather Khanty
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Khanty-Mansiysk

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Khanty-Mansiysk

>>average temperature by month Khanty-Mansiysk

>>Weather Khanty-Mansiysk

Generally, it is cold and temperate in Khanty-Mansiysk. The precipitation levels in the city of Khanty-Mansiysk are noteworthy, as there is a considerable amount of rainfall even during months that typically experience dry weather. According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing climate in this region is categorized as Dfb. The temperature here averages -0.8 °C | 30.5 °F. About 611 mm | 24.1 inch of precipitation falls annually.

average temperature by month Khanty-Mansiysk

At an average temperature of 17.7 °C | 63.9 °F, July is the hottest month of the year. On average, the month of January is considered to be the coldest time of year with temperatures averaging at around -20.3 °C | -4.5 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Khanty-Mansiysk

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days.

Between the driest and wettest months, the difference in precipitation is 70 mm | 3 inch. The fluctuation of temperatures across the seasons is referred to as 38.0 °C | 68.4 °F.

The month that sees the most relative humidity is November (65.35 %). The month with the lowest amount of relative humidity is May (65.35 %). The month with the highest amount of rainfall is August (13.50 days), whereas the one with the lowest precipitation level is February (7.53).

Khanty-Mansiysk weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Khanty-Mansiysk

The closest Airports of Khanty-Mansiysk are: Khanty-Mansiysk Airport (HMA) 4.90km,Surgut International Airport (SGC) 238.29km,Kogalym International Airport (KGP) 320.22km

You can reach Khanty-Mansiysk from this Cities by Plane: Yekaterinburg (SVX), Novosibirsk (OVB), Omsk (OMS), Ufa (UFA), Tyumen (TJM), Bishkek (FRU), Dushanbe (DYU), Chișinău (KIV), Tomsk (TOF), Nizhnevartovsk (NJC), Moscow (DME), Osh (OSS)
